content:
This patch hasn't gotten any review yet - https://reviews.llvm.org/D87474
Can someone more familiar with LLVM recommend an additional reviewer for me to ping? I looked at the code owners file, but didn't see anyone for the area I modified
For reference, this fixes the soundness issue https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/76387
pinged some folks who might know. @Nikita Popov might also know

@Aaron Hill here's what I heard back:

Normally I git blame/log relevant files and see what names frequently come up as reviewers/committers. For that patch, maybe rnk would be a good reviewer?
arc cover can do it for you.
It's a shame arc requires PHP on user's machine
